sections.transliteration: Shri Ramachandra Krupalu Bhaja Mana, Harana Bhavabhaya Darunam,
sections.translation: O mind! Revere the benign Shri Ramachandra, who removes 'Bhava' the worldly sorrow or pain, 'Bhaya' the fear, and 'Daruna' the scarcity or poverty.

sections.transliteration: Navakanja Lochana, Kanjamukha, Kara Kanja Pada Kanjarunam
sections.translation: Who has fresh lotus eyes, lotus face and lotus hands, feet like lotus and like the rising sun.

sections.transliteration: Kandarpa Aganita, Amit Chabi Navaneera-neerada Sundaram,
sections.translation: His beauty exceeds innumerable Kaamdevs (Cupids). He is like a newly formed beautiful blue cloud. The yellow robe on his body appears like delightful lighting.

sections.transliteration: Pata Peet Manahu Tadita Ruchi Shuchi, Noumi Janaka Sutavaram
sections.translation: He is the consort of the daughter of Sri Janak (Sri Sita), the embodiment of sacredness.॥

sections.transliteration: Bhaja Deenbandhu Dinesh Danav Dalan Dushta Nikandanam,
sections.translation: O mind, sing praises of Sri Ram, a friend of the poor. He is the lord of the solar dynasty. He is the destroyer of demons and devils and their race.
The descendant of Sri Raghu is the source of joy, a moon of his mother Kaushalya and he is the son of Sri Dashrath.

sections.transliteration: Shira Mukuta Kundala Tilaka Charu, Udaru Anga Vibhushanam,
sections.translation: He wears a crown on his head, pendants on his ear, and tilak (crimson mark) on his forehead. All his organs are beautiful and well decorated with ornaments.
His arms reach his knees. He holds a bow and an arrow. He emerged victorious in the battle with demons Khar and Dushan.

sections.transliteration: Iti Vadati Tulasidasa Shankara Shesha Muni-mana-ranjanam,
sections.translation: Thus says Sri Tulsidas – O Sri Ram, the charmer of Lord Shiv, Sri Shesh and saints,

sections.transliteration: Mama Hridai Kanja Nivaasa Kuru, Kaamaadi Khala-dala-ganjanam
sections.translation: reside in the lotus of my heart and destroy all the evils and their associates like desires.
